aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I'm a Computer Science student at the University of Waterloo, passionate about creating innovative software solutions and building robust digital infrastructure. I'm currently seeking internship opportunities for Winter and Summer 2026.
aboutMe.longTermGoal: My long-term goal is to develop smart software solutions that solve real-world problems and contribute to building the digital infrastructure of tomorrow.
aboutMe.athletics: I'm currently a member of the varsity swim team at the University of Waterloo, and was previously on the Canadian National Team, competing at the World Junior Championships and Pan American Games.
